channel.title: HELP! Pernix Fix and Client Error!
channel.description:
How do you fix the pernix cowl where when you wear it, it just acts invisible over your head? Please can anyone help me with this or link me a tutorial on how to fix it.
And heres the client error when i click on wise old man [code=java]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 32895 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:12) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:650) at client.drawInterface(client.java:9887) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:10583) at client.method146(client.java:14539) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9677) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10516) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: HELP! Pernix Fix and Client Error!
item.dc:creator: @jacobkid jacobkid
item.description:
@jacobkid wrote:

How do you fix the pernix cowl where when you wear it, it just acts invisible over your head?
Please can anyone help me with this or link me a tutorial on how to fix it.

And heres the client error when i click on wise old man

Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 32895 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:12) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:650) at client.drawInterface(client.java:9887) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:10583) at client.method146(client.java:14539) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9677) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10516) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
